lead_paragraph: DIAMOND--Henry. The Boards of The Woodstock Foundation, Inc. and Jackson Hole Preserve, Inc. mourn the death of Henry Diamond, longtime board member and giant in the field of conservation. His guidance will be greatly missed. Ellen R.C. Pomeroy, Chair, Board of Trustees 1/3
